title: Banco Santander global operations : geographic diversification of profit 2019
summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Region, and Share of attributable profit in each Region on the y axis.
The Share of attributable profit is appeared to be the highest at Region Europe and lowest at Region North America.
The highest value at Region Europe is 2.94x times more than the lowest value at North America.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of attributable profit for 3 number of Regions.
The Share of attributable profit is highest at Region Europe and lowest at Region North America.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of attributable profit for 3 number of Regions.
Region Europe has the highest Share of attributable profit and North America has the lowest Share of attributable profit.
Region  has the second highest value for Share of attributable profit.
The highest Region Europe has 31.0 more Share of attributable profit than the lowest Region North America.
